trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""> </xref> elemento em um arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The `<serviceCertificate>` element is a child element of the `<federationConfiguration>` element and configures the X.509 certificate, if any, that is used to encrypt and decrypt tokens when using WS-Federation.
trans-unit.target: O `<serviceCertificate>` é um elemento filho do `<federationConfiguration>` elemento e configura o certificado x.&509;, se houver, que é usada para criptografar e descriptografar tokens, ao usar o WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.ServiceCertificate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is an instance of ServiceCertificateElement.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ServiceCertificateElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ServiceCertificateElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<certificateReference>" name="<certificateReference>" href=""></xref> element for this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filho <xref uid="langword_csharp_<certificateReference>" name="<certificateReference>" href=""> </xref> elemento para este <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<certificateReference>` element contains settings that specify the location and verification parameters for the X.509 certificate to use to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
trans-unit.target: O `<certificateReference>` elemento contém configurações que especificam os parâmetros local e a verificação do certificado x.&509; a ser usado para criptografar e descriptografar tokens.
